nodes.text: Homing torpedoes were small projectile missiles, with a bigger warhead replaced with a guiding system. It made homing torpedoes less dangerous, but more maneuverable.
They were very useful on slow starships, such as freighters.
Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes of the Royal Naboo Security Forces found the homing torpedo upgrade for his N-1 starfighter during the Invasion of Naboo.

In the video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo, released in 2000, players may upgrade their proton torpedoes by finding an upgrade in the Borvo the Hutt mission. As acquiring the upgrade is necessary for 100% game completion, this article assumes the player did so.
